edu.umd.cs.psl.evaluation.statistics

Class SquareMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.evaluation.statistics.SquareMatrix

  • public class SquareMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Square matrix data structure. Basically, a wrapper for ParallelColt DenseDoubleMatrix2D, with some specialized methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SquareMatrix(int length)
      Initializes an empty square matrix of size length x length.
      SquareMatrix(SquareMatrix sm)
      Copy constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accumulate(java.util.Collection<SquareMatrix> sms)
      Accumulates the scores from a collection of square matrices.
      void accumulate(SquareMatrix sm)
      Accumulates the scores from another square matrix.
      static SquareMatrix aggregate(java.util.Collection<SquareMatrix> sms)
      Aggregates the scores of a collection of square matrices.
      static SquareMatrix average(java.util.Collection<SquareMatrix> sms)
      Averages the scores of an array of square matrices.
      SquareMatrix clone()
      Returns a deep copy of the matrix.
      double get(int i, int j)
      Get entry (i,j).
      int length()
      Returns the number of classes (labels).
      void set(int i, int j, double value)
      Set entry (i,j).
      java.lang.String toMatlabString(int numDigits)
      Returns a Matlab string representation of the matrix.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns ParallelColt's string representation of the matrix.
